subject: Re: [sugar] CSound - csnd
body:
In my ubuntu without sugar?I tried:gcc: ./csrc/*.cgcc: ./csrc_api/*.cAnd got:file or directory not foundOn 5/29/07, Jeremy Flores
 <flores1@mit.edu> wrote:

Try this command from the terminal:
 
gcc -o csoundxt -I/usr/include -I./include 
-I./include_api -DLINUX -D_POSIX_C_SOURCE -L/usr/lib -lasound -lm ./csrc/*.c 
./csrc_api/*.c
 
Jeremy
